I am a young professional in online creative industry with a degree in Bachelor of Multimedia Design from the University of Queensland (Brisbane, Australia). I am always active to learn new things, and also a quick learner! I am truly interested about User Experience Design and lots more coding languages.

Experience Permalink

2016-12-05 – present

Frontend/UI Developer at Agoda

Agoda is one of the world’s largest online hotel and accommodation booking platforms. Founded in 2005 and now part of Booking Holdings, Agoda offers travelers a fast, easy way to book hundreds of thousands of properties in almost every country on earth.

Highlights

  • Build SCSS/CSS Framework for Agoda use.
  • Re-standardize the website with Accessibility-minded.
  • Build Documentation using Jekyll.
  • Recreating UI Framework for Agoda's React usage.
  • Research and developer SCSS framework around the atomic approach.
  • Working in format MVC patterns.
  • Work using node module, yarn and Webpack.
  • Maintenance bundling process for a better web performance.
  • Coding custom HTML/HTML5, LESS/CSS/CSS3, Bootstrap and JavaScript/Jquery.
  • Develop multi-platform websites such as desktop platforms and mobile platforms.
  • Create Development Guideline for Frontend Developers responds to W3C standards,accessibility and advocated a web-standards approach to increase search engine optimization (SEO-friendly) and cross-browser friendly.
  • Creating Automation (Gulp/Grunt).
  • Experience with UX principles, prototyping, requirements gathering and usability testing.
  • Work dynamically in an agile development team (Scrum and Kanban).
  • Working cross-team and manage projects with successful outcomes.
  • Working with data and A/B testing to improve designs and products.
  • Coordinate UI Designers on the project life cycle, including design and development. Testing and coordinate Quality Assurance Officer.
